story:
For less than the cost of a latte you can contribute to the well-being
of a Guatemalan child through Pueblo a Pueblo, an organization committed to
hands-on, sustainable change in Santiago Atitlan, Guatemala.

Why support Pueblo a Pueblo? Because we are child-centered, family-focused, and community-based while addressing the needs of the indigenous families living in rural Guatemala. Our programs are helping children attend and succeed in school, keeping them healthy with regular medical check-ups, and improving literacy at the primary school level. By working actively and directly with community members, the goal is to create sustainable, long-lasting solutions to the widespread poverty, illiteracy and poor health that afflict the 43,000 people in the Santiago Atitlan region of the country.  We work ‘people-to-people’ to help people help themselves. 


In the Western Highlands of Guatemala, in Santiago Atitlan, lives one of the largest indigenous Maya communities in the Americas. The United Nations World Food Programme categorizes the indigenous people living in the highlands as the most vulnerable group in the country. According to USAID, Guatemala’s high infant morality and chronic malnutrition rates are concentrated among the indigenous people in this very region. The disparities between non-indigenous and indigenous Guatemalans is evident:

·  Income distribution in Guatemala is one of the most unequal in the Western Hemisphere

·  7 out of every 10 people of indigenous descent live in poverty

·  While chronic malnutrition is high in Guatemala, as high as 50%, it reaches 70% among the indigenous rural population

·  Illiteracy in woman 15 and older is 31.1% in all of Guatemala, and reaches 59% among indigenous women

·  Overall primary school enrollment rate is 39%- 48% in urban centers, yet less than 35% in rural areas

·  More than 40% of the rural population doesn’t have access to water in their homes 




Forgo one morning latte to provide two weeks worth of hand soap for a primary school.

Wait for that movie to come out on demand so you can provide a child with  a brand new backpack.

Why go out to dinner when you can purchase literacy education materials instead?

We know that attending that concert won't feel as good as feeding 200 kids a nutritious meal at school.

It's time to sell that old elliptical in your basement and provide a child with a primary school scholarship.


Better nutrition helps children maintain relationships, fight off infections and illnesses, and improve students' attention span and performance in school. Serving hot and nutritious meals daily provides additional incentives for parents to send their children to school, where they will now excel. 

Only 1 in 10 rural Guatemalan children graduate from middle school, resulting in wide spread illiteracy and low levels of economic mobility. This program not only improves literacy rates among students, but also empowers teachers and school administrators to take ownership of libraries and their resources. 

Children receive supplies, gym shoes and uniforms, and targeted assistance from 1st-6th grade. They also receive free checkups and emergency care at a local clinic. The primary education scholarships program has given dozens of students the opportunity to graduate the 6th grade with a better chance at a successful future.

WASH is an acronym for Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene. This project has built child-friendly hand washing stations, gender-segregated bathrooms, and water treatment systems in schools. Aside from the construction of sanitation facilities, teachers, students, and community members are educated on personal hygiene habits. Teachers have noticed an immediate, positive change in students’ self-esteem and attendance rates, and a decrease in the prevalence of childhood diarrhea. Students are even spreading their new knowledge, and teaching what they learned to family members back home!

Lack of food security and food diversity cause stunting due to lack of nutrients. In the Western Highlands of Guatemala, 70% of indigenous children are stunted and malnutrition rates reach 60%. The organic school gardens program addresses this issue by educating students about the benefits of eating the vitamins and minerals in the food they grow. The long-term impacts are even greater. As advocates for improved nutrition, these students are paving the way to food security for future generations. 

Learn more about these programs and others on our website


Venmo is also an option: 

Venmo Karina-Shedrofsky with the description "Pueblo a Pueblo" and send an email to karinashed@gmail.com the address you would like your perk sent to!


Can't contribute? Not a problem. Help us spread the word!

  • Use Indiegogo share tools from your Indiegogo account to refer friends to our campaign.
What kind of difference will you make today?

(some of the text is adapted from puebloapueblo.org)

story:
Why Earn The Same?

In North America, we have a dirty little secret: We don’t pay our women equally.

Depending on your source, you’ll see the wage gap reflects that women somewhere between 74 and 91 cents on the dollar. You may feel that this shows that some companies are doing better than others - we disagree - no gap is acceptable.

For far too long, this gap has been seen as systemic, something that ‘we’ didn’t have the power to change. Earn The Same is challenging that. We want to put the power into the hands of the workforce, by increasing transparency and letting their decisions speak loudly.  You have the power to choose.

What is Earn The Same?

At Earn The Same, we plan to aggregate crowdsourced salary data and compare against well known salary data feeds to make wage gap information on a per company basis widely available.

It’ll be your go-to spot for finding out what the wage gaps is for any company. We’ll also let you know which companies have more women represented in their workforce, and if that representation carries into senior roles.

How can this information change things?

Knowledge is power. When you’re informed about existing wage gaps at your current company, you’ll be better able to negotiate salary discussions for your current role. When you’re ready to move your career to the next opportunity, Earn The Same can help you direct your search towards companies that put equality first.

We’ll even do spotlight features on companies that go the extra mile to reduce the wage gap, and those with a better representation of women in senior roles.

How can you help?

There are three key ways you can help Earn The Same achieve its goals!

Donate.

  • To build this tool, we’ll need a talented team of developers and designers — and they don’t work for free! With your donations, we’ll be hiring a technical team that can turn the Earn The Same dream into a reality. If we don't reach our full goal, we'll use any funds raised to create a early stage version of the Earn the Same. We'll then take our beta version, and attempt to raise funds again. We believe Earn the Same is important, and we're dedicated to making it a reality! 

Share

  • Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and with those you know. Tell them why the wage gap matters to you — after all, you deserve the full dollar!

Inform

  • To make the Earn the Same dream a reality, we need real income information from people just like you. Sign up for our mailing list to be notified as soon as we begin collecting income information — and encourage the men and women in your life to do the same. The wage gap isn’t just a women’s issue, it’s a human issue!

story:
Hi! I'm Malea

I’m Malea, a multipassionate, single, homeschooling mom and kick-azz writer, illustrator, and encourager of others. I’m a lady from here and there in the United States, raising a teenage son and two dogs on my own. I love my life, but I’m ready to step up my business game plan by attending It’s Business Time, a 6-month program run by Michelle Ward, Tiffany Han, and Erin Cassidy. This is my chance to dream big, work hard, and combine my heart and soul passions into a business game plan with guidance and support from ladies that I consider to be the best of the best in their fields.

My immediate goal for this program? Combining my multiple interests into one brand, one business, one rocket ship to success.

My long-range goal? To use everything I learn in It’s Business Time to help others reach their own success whether it be a mom homeschooling her kids for the first time, a website owner who hates blogging but understands its importance, or a young woman trying to figure out her life’s purpose as she juggles college classes and a job.

The chance to work with these three ladies is my meet-a-rockstar moment. When I found out they had accepted my application, my super-introverted, always-careful-in-public self did a herky-jerky-wild-turkey dance in the front seat of my car while parked on a busy street with people walking by.

And, each time I receive an email from any of them related to my application (or for any other reason) that isn’t part of a mailing list? Whoa!

I keep asking myself, “Is this real?” It is!

It’s Business Time had only TEN spots available! I know these ladies have HUGE followings so to be accepted is AMAZEBALLS, to use a term from Michelle.

Help me out so that down the road I can help others – in exchange I’ve got some cool perks for ya!

What I Need & What You Get

What I need:

  • $5,000 to cover the cost of the entire program.

What you get:

I’m offering up:

  • coloring pages from my digital download Etsy shop
  • upcycled envelopes and hand illustrated envelopes from my snailmail Etsy shop
  • hand illustrated greeting cards that you will find NOWHERE else
  • your name hand illustrated with an intricate design – frame and display it or use it as a coloring page
  • blog ghost writing services
  • copyediting and proofreading services
  • coaching and mentoring

The Impact

There was a time when I thought getting a college degree while raising a toddler, working, and dealing with an abuser was impossible. My mentors showed me the path to success.

There was a time when I thought moving to a new city would be my ruin. My mentors supported me and helped me make it work.

There was a time when I thought unhappiness was the norm. My mentors showed me the truth.

With It's Business Time, I will be able to help others in the same way. I've already helped a former tutoring student find his way into one of the country's best universities - four years earlier he was failing. I've helped several people move out of dead end jobs and into jobs they love. I've provided the right written words when otherwise successful people have been at a loss to find them. And so much more.

Your contribution will help me continue that work.

Risks & Challenges

I may not raise all of the funds I need for It's Business Time. If I don't, I'll find another way. I know I have what it takes to help others because I have already done so. My hope is that friends, family, and strangers who love to champion the underdog will be my support system in this new adventure.

I would love to reach my entire goal through IndieGoGo, but even if I don’t, I want to thank you for contributing. The funds raised, even if I don’t hit the $5k goal will still go towards my membership in It’s Business Time.

If I go OVER the goal, those funds will go towards three things:

  • buying books and supplies to donate to schools and literacy programs (I’ll blog about it on my reading blog!
  • a scholarship fund for other creative entrepreneurs to put towards business and coaching programs to further their careers and dreams

Other Ways You Can Help

Don’t want to contribute via IndieGoGo but still want to offer support? No problem! It’s not for everyone! Consider these ideas:

  • Tell a friend
  • Tweet this or share my campaign on other social media (super easy to use buttons on the left side of the screen towards the top!)
  • Visit my Etsy shops HERE and HERE and pick up a little something for yourself or as a gift for someone else.
Questions? Email me at mabaer3409 {{at}} gmail {{dot}} com.

I’ll be blogging about my journey through It’s Business Time on my original blog where I write about homeschooling, art, travel, and a whole lot more. EVERY contributor, regardless of the perks level, will receive a shout out on my blog too.

I’ve overcome many hurdles to get to where I am today and I know I have more hurdles ahead. Help me reach this dream so that in the future I may pay it forward and help others with their dreams too.

Other places where you can find me:
  • Instagram
  • Reading Rory's List
  • Save, Sally, Save
  • Slow Like the Tortoise
  • M and J in a Nutshell
story_txt:
Hi! I'm MaleaI’m Malea, a multipassionate, single, homeschooling mom and
kick-azz writer, illustrator, and encourager of others. I’m a lady from here and
there in the United States, raising a teenage son and two dogs on my own. I
love my life, but I’m ready to step up my business game plan by attending It’s Business Time, a 6-month program run by Michelle Ward, Tiffany Han, and Erin Cassidy. This is my chance to dream big, work hard, and combine my
heart and soul passions into a business game plan with guidance and support
from ladies that I consider to be the best of the best in their fields.My immediate goal for this program? Combining my multiple
interests into one brand, one business, one rocket ship to success. 
My long-range goal? To use everything I learn in It’s
Business Time to help others reach their own success whether it be a mom
homeschooling her kids for the first time, a website owner who hates blogging
but understands its importance, or a young woman trying to figure out her
life’s purpose as she juggles college classes and a job. 
The chance to work with these three ladies is my
meet-a-rockstar moment. When I found out they had accepted my application, my
super-introverted, always-careful-in-public self did a herky-jerky-wild-turkey
dance in the front seat of my car while parked on a busy street with people
walking by. And, each time I receive an email from any of them related to my
application (or for any other reason) that isn’t part of a mailing list? Whoa! I keep asking myself, “Is this real?” It is! 
It’s Business Time had only TEN spots available! I know
these ladies have HUGE followings so to be accepted is AMAZEBALLS, to use a
term from Michelle. 
Help me out so that down the road I can help others – in exchange
I’ve got some cool perks for ya!
What I Need & What You Get
What I need:

$5,000 to cover the cost of the entire program. 
What you get:
I’m offering up:

coloring pages from my digital download Etsy shop

upcycled envelopes and hand illustrated
envelopes from my snailmail Etsy shop

hand illustrated greeting cards that you will
find NOWHERE else
your name hand illustrated with an intricate design
– frame and display it or use it as a coloring page
blog ghost writing services
copyediting and proofreading services
coaching and mentoring

 

The ImpactThere
 was a time when I thought getting a college degree while raising a 
toddler, working, and dealing with an abuser was impossible. My mentors 
showed me the path to success.There was a time when I thought moving to a new city would be my ruin. My mentors supported me and helped me make it work.
There was a time when I thought unhappiness was the norm. My mentors showed me the truth.
With
 It's Business Time, I will be able to help others in the same way. I've
 already helped a former tutoring student find his way into one of the 
country's best universities - four years earlier he was failing. I've helped several people move out of dead
 end jobs and into jobs they love. I've provided the right written words
 when otherwise successful people have been at a loss to find them. And so much more.Your contribution will help me continue that work. Risks & ChallengesI may not raise all of the funds I need for 
It's Business Time. If I don't, I'll find another way. I know I have 
what it takes to help others because I have already done so. My hope is 
that friends, family, and strangers who love to champion the underdog 
will be my support system in this new adventure.I would love to reach my entire goal through IndieGoGo, but
even if I don’t, I want to thank you for contributing. The funds raised, even
if I don’t hit the $5k goal will still go towards my membership in It’s Business
Time. 
If I go OVER the goal, those funds will go towards three
things:

buying books and supplies to donate to schools and literacy programs (I’ll blog about it on my reading blog!
a scholarship fund for other creative
entrepreneurs to put towards business and coaching programs to further their
careers and dreams
  Other Ways You Can Help
Don’t want to contribute via IndieGoGo but still want to
offer support? No problem! It’s not for everyone! Consider these ideas:

Tell a friend
Tweet this or share my campaign on other social
media (super easy to use buttons on the left side of the screen towards the top!)
Visit my Etsy shops HERE and HERE and pick up a
little something for yourself or as a gift for someone else.


Questions? Email me at mabaer3409 {{at}} gmail {{dot}} com.
I’ll be blogging about my journey through It’s Business Time
on my original blog where I write about homeschooling, art, travel, and a whole
lot more. EVERY contributor, regardless of the perks level, will receive a
shout out on my blog too.

I’ve overcome many hurdles to get to where I am today and I
know I have more hurdles ahead. Help me reach this dream so that in the future
I may pay it forward and help others with their dreams too.Other places where you can find me:
Instagram
Reading Rory's List
Save, Sally, Save
Slow Like the Tortoise

story:
Hello  Everyone,  We are back with our new campaign. We appreciate the contributions you made towards our last campaign “Winter Wear for Worthy Orphans” https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/winter-wear-for-worthy-orphans/x/7449235.We will very much appreciate that you share and support in this campaign as well. Thank you very much!

Helping orphans with new classrooms

Launching a new campaign for needed funds for classroom construction of an orphanage, Sharon Children Home in India.  Sitting outside teaching students in harsh (difficult) weather makes it very important for us  to find a way to get support to build the new classrooms.Sharon Children Home is not supported by grants or governmental aid.  They are solely dependent on donations from compassionate organizations and individuals like you and me.  The home exists to care for abandoned children who have no recourse but to live in the streets and survive from the refuse of trash dumps.  Sharon strives to mentor these children and educate them to be productive citizens of society. This orphanage houses and cares for 60 children who have an immediate need for 5 classrooms to fulfill their educational needs.  In addition, desks are being purchased for each of the classrooms.  $5500 is the total needed for 5 classrooms and 60 desks.  As of now, the children are sitting on floors in a less than favorable learning environment.  Your donations would be appreciated in helping these children to grow in knowledge for their roles in society.

Sharon Children Home is  not supported from the goverment or any other organizations and we  have to rely on ourselves in getting support to improve the orphanage.We are solely dependent on donations from compassionate organizations and individuals like you.Thank you Very Much !

story:
>>>  POLISH VERSION DOWN BELOW<<<
>>> PONIZEJ JEST WERSJA W JEZYKU POLSKIM <<<

•••••••••••••••••••
•••  THE IDEA  •••
•••••••••••••••••••
This project is to bring help for children in Tamil Nadu, India and to help me fulfill my great dream. You can call it "2 in 1 deep from the heart".

Once a year, Isha Foundation (est. 1992) organises the unique Himalaya trek for 35 participants, which is only on invitation basis. Each one has to make... 25 000$ donation, 85% of these funds then go to schools adopted by Isha. This trek is the fundraising created by Isha. And I have received the invitation in the end of April... but the donation is completely out of my range and the registration for this year's trek closes on 31 May 2015.

This is the unique ONCE-IN-A-LIFETIME Himalaya spiritual journey, which is - at the same time - the social NON-PROFIT communities intense development program (adoption of public schools in India and revamping the education model, to make it child-friendly, growth-supporting and break the poverty cycle this way).
Please read and see, if you want to be part of this (please, feel free to ask questions if anything requires additional information).



•••••••••••••••••••••••••
••• THE DEADLINE •••
•••••••••••••••••••••••••

Actually, there are two deadlines :)
In variant "energy" - until 31st May 2015
In variant "patience" - until end of April 2016 (postponed a year)

So, this or that way, but we can be successful :)
In both scenarios the money will go directly to the Foundation. You can see more details in the following chapter "Budget: where is the money going?".

Now, please aim at "energy". I will let you know in updates when the plan B is on.
"Patience" is more difficult as it involves waiting... :) but big goals need time to realise!

UPDATE:
Time to shift to plan B! It looks like there is too little time to gather necessary donation for this year. And Isha confirmed that my invitation will be still valid for 2016!!!
So, I will continue my crowd-funding endeavour until the next year's trek. The CAMPAIGN WILL BE CONTINUED until April 2016!

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  BUDGET: WHERE IS THE MONEY GOING?  •••
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Isha Foundation creates a long term projects on the large scale, which are then carrefully taken care of. They know that big results require wisdom and persistence. More descriptions of Isha projects you can see down below in the "Isha Foundation" section.

This Isha foundrising bundle consists of two parts:

••• PART 1 of this project (85% of funds or more):
So, this HIMALAYAN TREK IS planned as a FUNDRAISING PROGRAM and 85% of the proceeds will go to the rural outreach projects of Isha Foundation (changing the education model in India to make it more child-friendly, and growth-supporting by adoption and revamping of public schools). The smaller part is for organizing the trek itself - that's how they deciced. Because of this… the required donation is set very high, far beyond my financial range.

There are 100s of rural schools adopted by Isha in India to revamp the whole education system which is being a major role player for the upliftment of rural India.

Isha changes the education system in India by three different initiatives:
1) Isha has its own Isha Home School (a completely astonishing place, believe me I have seen many fantastic schools in my life, but this one is just amazing).
2) Isha Vidhya (9 Rural Schools in Tamil Nadu & Andhra Pradesh, built by Isha with 5820 children, 58% of them on full scholarship and the rest on subsidised fees).
3) Adoption of public schools in Tamil Nadu, Indie (aims to enhance the quality of education in Govt. schools and result in several thousands of children benefiting from a meaningful education).

The Adoption of Public Schools program aims to deeply restructure the adopted schools, to make it child-friendly and growth-supporting.
  • Inducting teachers to teach remedial classes to mainstream the slow learners
  • Improving English language capabilities of children through other methodologies.
  • Infusing hitherto neglected aspects like Sports, Yoga, Arts & Crafts, Health, Hygiene & Environmental awareness, to bring all round development and sustain children’s interest in coming to school.   
  • Adding some badly needed infrastructure like toilets, computers, library books, etc.
  • Training Govt. school teachers to access and use classroom educational aids and digital content.

The necessary donation (per each participant) for this non-profit Isha Foundation project is  25 000 USD . So we need to gather minimum 27 500 $ (including indiegogo fees and transaction bank fees).

BUT REMEMBER...
••• EACH 5$ IS VERY IMPORTANT !!! •••
AS DROPS MAKE THE OCEAN

OF COURSE,
IF WE COLLECT MORE - THE DONATION WILL BE BIGGER :)

(The additional costs of necessary preparations for the trek I will pay myself.)


IF THE GOAL IS ONLY PARTLY REALISED - THE BLACK SCENARIO:

  • all gathered money go to children :)))
  • I do not go to Himalaya with Sadhguru neither this nor next year :(
  • BUT IT IS STILL GOOD !!!!! :)


VERY IMPORTANT: After the campaign is closed everyone will receive the scan of confirmation of donation for Isha Foundation by email or I will upload it to the updates section, with a registered number, which you can check at Isha directly.

••••• PART 2 of this project (15% of funds or less):
I just have been offered a very unique opportunity to participate in the Himalayan trek with one of the greatest living Masters of ancient yoga, Sadhguru.


This will be an intimate small group of people with a once-in-a-life time opportunity to travel for 21 days to the sacred spaces of Kailash and Manasarovar with each step guided by Sadhguru himself. This is a chance for me to experience different states of awareness and to get in touch with the core of life process. This program is offered not as a tour, but as a possibility for deep spiritual transformation. This is something amazing for me, a chance for a great dream becoming reality. I have invested so much in self development during my whole life - this would be time for harvest. The contact with spiritual Master is like using GPS in unknown terrain - something which could take long years to achieve you may reach in a matter of months. Sadhguru says it this way: "GPS stands for Guru Positioning System" :)



“Manasarovar is a phenomena that defies human logic. There are not many things I can say about it. I think every human being who is interested in the nature of life; in the nature of life beyond us; in the nature of intelligence beyond us - must make a visit to this place because here is… it clearly defies our logic and intelligence."
– Sadhguru

And I am a seeker all my life asking questions about the nature of the existence. But also a sceptic and realist, who decided to gradually open toward spirituality. Not as some new age excitement but spirituality seen as an old science deeply rooted in the very core of construction of the universe. I was always extremely interested in the life itself but at the same time very cautious as a realist not to go some dead-end street. "When you believe something does't mean you know it" - like Sadhguru says. It's difficult not to agree with it, when you are aware that your mind is limited and likes the ruts of beaten track.

"As we have physical science to create external well-being there is a whole inner dimension of science to create inner well being. I call it Inner Engineering."
- Sadhguru

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  DON'T HAVE THE CASH?  •••
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Share this page - shares are almost as important as $$$
  • 'Share' the campaign on Facebook and Twitter and encourage your friends to do the same (use the "share" button on the campaign page);
  • The more social media likes, and shares this campaign generate, the higher our Indiegogo "gogofactor" rises, which means - IndieGoGo will give us more exposure, which means more people will know about us, more press coverage, and all that good stuff! So SHARE US!



BE A PART OF THIS PROCESS, IF YOU CARE!
I will share my experience with other people, as honestly as I will be able to.
THIS IS A TRUE WIN-WIN PROJECT.


••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  THE ISHA FOUNDATION  •••
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

You may still wonder if money and enlightened spirituality go well together. Sadhguru is a very rare type of realized yogi and mistic. He is both the enlightened being and a man of the world. He is not sitting in some cave, though he’s one of the biggest yogis on the planet.

So, sometimes you can see him riding his bike :)
As he says it himself "...being spiritual does not necessary mean being impractical..."

But...

This life for me is an endeavor to help people experience and express their divinity. May you know the bliss of the Divine.”
– Sadhguru

“There is only one business in the world and that is of human wellbeing.”
 – Sadhguru

He has founded in 1992 Isha as a non-profit foundation which is strongly engaged in helping people in poor rural areas in India. Isha conducts their projects, with both medical and social help, curing people, engaging them in different activities or building schools for children. Isha is running also other initiatives, like The Project GreenHands (PGH). This environmental project aims to increase the green cover of the state of Tamil Nadu to the required 33%, by planting 114 million trees. PGH set a Guinness World Record on 17th October, 2006 for planting maximum number of saplings in a single day ( 852 587 saplings).

Sadghuru is also engaged in contact with economic leaders to rich through them a significant influence on people's life who are dependent on these leaders. He is a participant of many important economic international forums, like Davos.


Above you can watch the talk with Vinita Bali, an Indian businesswoman who is the Managing Director and CEO of Britannia Industries Limited.



Above you can watch the talk with a well known Indian television journalist Barkha Dutt.

Isha’s powerful yoga programs for inner transformation and inspiring projects for society and environment are appreciated worldwide, reflecting in Isha's consultative status with the United Nations Economic and Social Council.

They need real money to do this!
Spirituality and sitting in cave is not enough to achieve such goals.

Drawn from the essence of the ancient yogic sciences, Sadhguru offers  many Yogic Programs through Isha Foundation. These are fine distilled and very powerful programs, mostly kriya practices influencing directly ones energies. At the same time they are relatively little time consuming and easy to learn. In spite of kriyas, Isha is also offering yogaasanas programs.
This is the core of ancient yoga, in pure Patanjali way of teaching which is an extremely rare thing to find in the world now. This means yoga, without geographical and cultural transformations gathered over thousands of years, gradually changing the face and the meaning of yoga. Isha is teaching us just the essence of ancient yoga knowledge about construction of the universe, discovering the source of creation inside us and above all how to experience blissfulness.
Did you know, that this ancient yogic knowledge is confirmed by concepts and discoveries of modern sciences?
Did you know that in yogic lore Shiva does not mean a hindu god? It literaly means "that which is not" and this refers exactly to what modern phisics calls dark matter and dark energy. The vast part of existence which is not in our perception right now, but is the basis of the physical existence as we know it. The intelligence which is far beyond human one and which constructs the whole universe.


•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  MY YOGA PRACTICE  •••
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

See updates tab for a short story behind this picture (update #3).

I am deeply engaged in yoga practice now (do not mistake this for twisting the body in strange postures) - 2 hours daily. But when I started I could not believe the range of changes I have experienced just after 3 months of a most basic kriya practice (Shambhavi Mahamudra, 21 minutes to complete). It was completely surprising to me. But it was my experience and it was hard to deny.  There are two types of the mistake on the way to know better the world and I wanted to avoid both of them. One - when you accept many things easily, without hesitation, and thus you are drawn into you own imagination. The other one, when you reject everything which does not fit your current model of assumptions and thus you cannot go beyond your current beliefs.

The changes I've experienced at the beginning:
1) I stopped getting colds (I was getting cold once a month and worried there is something very wrong with my health)
2) The most difficult emotions are smoothed to the degree I couldn't believe - the life become so much easier :)
3) My thought process become even brighter (though thinking was always a strong side of me)

So I wanted more. You always want to expand. :) So, I do many more ancient yoga practices right now. And I want it all. I want to go beyond our common level of perceiving reality. Of course, this doesn't mean I want loose my mind :) I simply want to experience the core of creation and blissfulness. This Himalayan trek with Sadhguru is a milestone step in this direction. I know it so intensely. The contact with the master is something difficult to overestimate. This is like using GPS in unknown terrain - something which could take long years to achieve you may reach in a matter of months.

In the whole yoga system everything is a matter of experience, not a matter of a somebody's else belief. Thus the only way is to try it yourself.


••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  SADHGURU  •••
••••••••••••••••••••••

The word ‘Isha’ means the formless primordial source of creation. Who stands behind it? See below:
Sadhguru’s Enlightenment.
On the afternoon of September 23, 1982, a young businessman sat down at his favorite spot on Chamundi Hill. As he sat with his eyes open, suddenly he slipped into a state where he could not differentiate between himself and his surroundings. It was a staggering explosion. “What was ‘me’ was everywhere.” After nearly four hours, which felt like only a few minutes, he came back to his usual self. He found himself drenched in tears, while his mind grappled to find an explanation –
“Something was happening within me. I did not know what it was. All I knew was – I’ve hit a goldmine and I didn’t want to lose it.”


WATCH how he describes HIS EXPERIENCE here at google INK Conference at 2009.


Well, one may say Sadhguru’s capabilities are in the scope of Gautama the Buddha.

"Everything in the existence, every physical form, is a question of geometry. Whether something functions smoothly or not essentially depends upon the perfection of geometry. The whole system of hatha yoga is just this – to fix your geometry in such a way that this machine will function without any friction within itself. Only when there is no inner friction you are no longer an issue. But if just existing here is an issue, where is the question of scaling the peaks of consciousness? Such a thing will not occur to you. Only when everything is at ease can you take something on. When you are not an issue, you can attend to anything you want. Or, you can close your eyes and sit – both the choices are here."
- Sadhguru

BE A PART OF THIS PROCESS, IF YOU CARE!
I will share my experience with other people, as honestly as I will be able to.
THIS IS A TRUE WIN-WIN PROJECT.




>>>  POLISH VERSION BELOW <<<
>>> PONIZEJ JEST WERSJA W JEZYKU POLSKIM <<<


•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  JAKI TO PROJEKT?  •••
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Ten projekt niesie duza pomoc dla dzieci w Tamil Nadu, Indie oraz pomoc dla mnie w spelnieniu mojego wielkiego marzenia. W sumie jest to takie "2 w 1 gleboko od serca".

Fundacja Isha (rok zal. 1992) organizuje raz w roku niezwykla wyprawe w Himalaje dla 35 uczestnikow, w ktorej mozna wziac udzial po otrzymaniu zaproszenia. Kazdy uczestnik musi zrobic donacje w wysokosci... 25 000$, a 85% tej kwoty zostaje przeznaczona na pomoc szkolom zaadoptowanym prze Isha. Ta wyprawa jest sposobem w jaki Isha zbiera pieniadze na cele swojej fundacji. Pod koniec kwietnia otrzymalem zaproszenie od Isha... ale donacja jest calkowicie poza moim zasiegiem, a rejestracja na wyprawe konczy sie 31 maja 2015.

Mam szanse na doświadczenie, które zdarza sie RAZ W ZYCIU - duchowa wyprawa w Himalaje. Jednoczesnie, ta wyprawa jest zbiorka pieniedzy na program fundacji NON-PROFIT,  wspierajacy rozwoj dzieci w ubogich spolecznosciach (poprzez adopcje szkol publicznych, aby zmienic model edukacji na przyjazny dzieciom i wspierajacy ich rozwoj - zeby przerwac cykl ubostwa w tych regionach).
Przeczytajcie i zobaczcie czy chcielibyście pomóc mi w tym (i prosze pytajcie mnie o wszystko, cokolwiek wydaloby sie nie dosc jasne).



••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
••• DO KIEDY TRWA ZBIORKA? •••
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

W zasadzie, to są dwa terminy zakonczenia zbiorki :)
W wariancie "energia" - do 31 Maja 2015
W wariancie "cierpliwosc" - do konca kwietnia 2016 (pozniej o rok)

W ten sposob, tak czy siak moze sie udac :)
W obu scenariuszach pieniadze trafia bezposrednio do fundacji Isha. Wiecej informacji znajdziesz w nastepnym rozdziale "Budzet: na co ida te pieniadze?"

Na razie, prosze nastawiaj sie na wariant "energia". Dam znac w 'updates' jesli przejdziemy do planu B.
"Cierpliwosc" jest trudniejsza wersja, bo wymaga czekania... :) ale duze cele wymagaja czasu na realizacje!

UPDATE:
Czas przejsc do planu B! Widac, ze zostalo za malo czasu, zeby uzbierac potrzebna kwote na ten rok. Mam potwierdzenie od Isha, ze moje zaproszenie zachowuje waznosc na rok 2016! :)
Bede wiec kontynuowal ten projekt crowd-fundingowy do przyszlego roku. Czyli kampania będzie prowadzona do kwietnia 2016! :)

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  BUDZET: NA CO IDĄ TE PIENIĄDZE?  •••
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Fundacja Isha tworzy dlugoterminowe programy pomocy, na duza skale, ktore sa pozniej realizowane z duzo starannoscia. Doskonale wiedza, ze do osiagniecia duzych celow potrzeba madrosci i wytrwalosci. Wiecej opisow innych projektow fundacji mozna znalezc w podrozdziale "Fundacja Isha" w tekscie ponizej.

Ten projekt zbiorki pieniedzy przez Isha jest zestawem zlozonych z dwoch czesci:

••• CZESC 1 tego projektu (85% funduszy lub wiecej):
Ta jedyna w swoim rodzaju WYPRAWA W HIMALAJE JEST POMYSLANA PRZEZ ISHA JAKO ZBIORKA FUNDUSZY, a 85% zebranych środkow zostanie przeznaczone na  wiejskie programy pomocowe prowadzone przez Fundacje Isha (zmiana modelu edukacji w Indiach na przyjazny dzieciom, wspierajacy ich rozwoj, poprzez adopcje szkol publicznych i objecie ich opieka Isha). Mniejsza czesc kwoty idzie na organizowanie samej wyprawy. Dlatego... wymagana donacja od kazdego uczestnika jest ustalona bardzo wysoko. Niestety, zupelnie poza zasiegiem moich mozliwosci.

Fundacja Isha zaadoptowala 100-ki wiejskich szkol w Indiach, zeby przebudowac caly system edukacji, ktory ma ogromy wplyw na poprawianie warunkow zycia ludzi z wiejsckich obszarow Indii. Kiedy edukacja sprzyja dzieciom, pozwala na wyrwanie ludzi z zakletego kregu ubostwa. Taka zbiorka Isha organizuje co roku.

Isha zmienia system edukacji w Indiach prowadzac trzy rozne inicjatywy:
1) storzyli swoja wlasna Isha Home School (zupelnie niezwykle miejsce, wierzcie, ze widzialem juz kilka wspanialych szkol w swoim zyciu, ale ta na prawde oczarowujaca)
2) Isha Vidhya (9 wiejskich szkol w Tamilnadu i Andhra Pradesh, zbudowanych przez Isha. Chodzi do nich 5820 dzieci, 58% z nich ma pelne stupendium a reszta jest na czesciowym wsparciu)
3) Adopcja szkol publicznych w Tamilnadu, Indie (w celu poprawy sposobu nauczania w tych szkolach, tak zeby dziesiatki tysiecy dzieci w tych szkolach mogly otrzymac dobra, wspierajaca edukacje)

Celem programu Adopcji Szkol Publicznych jest gleboka przebudowa sposobu nauczania w tych szkolach, zeby staly sie przyjazne dzieciom i wspierajace ich rozwoj.
  • poprawa w poslugiwaniu sie przez dzieci jezykiem angielskim, poprzez wlaczenie innych metod nauczania,
  • wprowadzanie dotad pomijanych aspektow jak sport, joga, sztuka i rekodzielo, zdrowie, higiena, swiadomosc dot. srodowiska - zeby zadbac o wszechstronny rozwoj i zachecic dzieci do przychodzenia do szkoly,
  • uzupelnianie niezbednej infrastruktury, jak toalety, komputery, ksiazki do bibliotek szkolnych, itp.
  • szkolenia zawodowe dla nauczycieli z tych szkol publicznych, zeby w bogatszy i ciekawy sposob prowadzili lekcje, stosujac urozmaicone pomoce, w tym komputery.

Potrzebna donacja dla Fundacji Isha (non-profit) wynosi w tym projekcie 25 000 USD (na kazdego uczestnika wyprawy). Zalezy mi dlatego, zeby zebrac 27 500 $ (uwzgledniajac oplaty platformy indiegogo oraz oplaty bankowe).


ALE PAMIETAJCIE...
••• KAZDE 3 czy 5$ (ok. 11-18zl) JEST BARDZO WAZNE !!! •••
BO KROPLE TWORZA OCEAN

oplaty sa pobierane z karty czy PayPal w zlotowkach; PayPal to jeden z najbardziej bezpiecznych systemow platnosci internetowych, mozna go zaladowywac i rozladowywac jak portmonetke :)
/w prawach technicznych dot. wplat sluze pomoca/

OCZYWISCIE,
JESLI ZBIERZEMY WIECEJ - DAROWIZNA BEDZIE WIEKSZA :)

(Dodatkowe koszty przygotowan do wyprawy pokryje sam.)

JESLI ZBIORKA ZOSTANIE TYLKO CZESCIOWO ZREALIZOWANA - CZARNY SCENARIUSZ - WTEDY:
  • wszystkie zebrane pieniadze ida dla dzieci :)))
  • ja nie jade w Himalaje z Sadhguru w tym ani przyszlym roku :(
  • ALE TO NADAL JEST DOBRA SYTUACJA !!!!! :)

BARDZO WAZNE: Po zakonczeniu kampanii kazdemu darczyncy wysle e-mailem albo umieszcze w dziale updates skan potwierdzenia darowizny na fundacje Isha, z numerem tej darowizny, ktory pozwoli potwierdzic wiarygodnosc darowizny bezposrednio w fundacji Isha.

••••• CZESC 2 tego projektu (15% funduszy lub mniej):
To mozliwosc udzialu w wyprawie w Himalaje z jednym z wielkich obecnie zyjacych mistrzow starozytnej jogi, Sadhguru.


Niewielka grupa uczestnikow bedzie miala niepowtarzalna w zyciu szanse podrozowac przez 21 dni do Kailash i Manasarowar, pod przewodnictwem Sadhguru. Sa to miejsca o szczególnym znaczeniu duchowym, z niezwyklymi wlasciwosciami energetycznymi. Dla mnie jest to szansa na doswiadczenie stanow poszerzonej swiadomosci i dotknięcie rdzenia procesu zycia. Ta wyprawa jest pomyslana nie jako turystyka, tylko jako okazja na gleboka duchowa przemiane. Jest to coś absolutnie niezwyklego dla mnie, szansa, zeby spelnilo sie wielkie marzenie. Przez cale zycie zainwestowalem ogromna ilosc energii w rozwoj, prace nad soba - to jest szansa na zbieranie owocow. Mistrz duchowy jest jak GPS w nieznanym terenie - cos co mogloby trwac dlugie lata mozesz zrobic w miesiace. Jak mowi Sadhguru, GPS oznacza Guru Positioning System. :)



“Manasarovar jest zjawiskiem, ktore stawia wyzwanie logice ludzkiego umyslu. Niewiele rzeczy moge teraz o nim powiedziec. Uwazam, ze kazdy czlowiek, ktorego ciekawi czym jest natura procesu zycia; natura procesu zycia poza zyciem jakie sami znamy; natura inteligencji wykraczajaca poza ta jaka znamy sami - powinien odwiedzic to miejsce, poniewaz... w bardzo przejrzysty sposob stawia ono wyzwanie naszej ludzkiej logice i inteligencji."
– Sadhguru

Przez cale zycie zadawalem pytania o zycie, istnienie i szukalem odpowiedzi. Jestem tez sceptykiem i realista, ktory zdecydowal sie stopniowo otworzyc na duchowosc. Nie chodzi mi o rodzaj podekscytowania w stylu new age, ale o stabilny rozwoj duchowosci, osadzonej w starozytnej wiedzy jogicznej, w zasadach konstruujacych wszechswiat.
Od zawsze bylem niezwykle zaciekawiony zyciem jako takim, a rownoczesnie bylem ostroznym realista. Zalezalo mi, zeby nie utknac w jakims slepym zaulku posiadanych przekonan. "To, ze jestes o czyms przekonany nie znaczy, ze to wiesz" - jak mowi Sadhguru. Trudno sie z tym nie zgodzic, jesli wiemy, ze nasz umysl ma ograniczenia i lubi koleiny utartych sciezek.

"Podobnie jak mamy nauki fizyczne, zeby tworzyc zewnetrzny dobrostan , istnieje caly wewnetrzny wymiar nauki sluzacy temu, by tworzyc wewnetrzny dobrostan. Nazywam go  Wewnetrzna Inzynieria."
- Sadhguru

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  NIE MASZ PIENIEDZY?  •••
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Udostepnij ta strone - udostepnianie jest niemal tak samo wazne jak pieniadze:
  • 'Udostepnij' strone tej kampanii na Facebook albo Twitter i zachecaj swoich znajomych do udostepniania jej;
  • Czy wiecej udostepnien i polubie w mediach spolecznosciowych, tym bardziej wzrasta wskaznik Indiegogo "gogofactor", a od tego zalezy czy IndieGoGo bedzie wyswietlal ta kampanie na swojej stronie! Prosze, UDOSTEPNIAJ!



DOLACZ DO TEGO PRZEDSIEWZIECIA!
Obiecuje, ze podziele sie wszystkim, czego uda mi sie doswiadczyc,
tak szczerze jak tylko bede umial.
TO JEST NAPRAWDE PROJEKT TYPU WIN-WIN.


•••••••••••••••••••••••••••
•••  FUNDACJA ISHA  •••
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Byc moze nadal zastanawiasz sie, czy pieniadze ida w parze z oswiecona duchowoscia. Sadhguru jest bardzo rzadko spotykanym rodzajem spelnionego jogina i mistyka. Jest osoba oswiecona i... "czlowiekiem swiata". Nie siedzi samotnie medytujac w jaskini, chociaz jest jednym z najwiekszych joginow na naszej planecie.

Tak wiec, czasami mozna zobaczyc go jak pedzi na motocyklu :)
Jak sam mówi "...bycie uduchowionym nie musi oznaczać bycia niepraktycznym...".

Jednak...

To zycie jest dla mnie wysilkiem, aby pomoc ludziom doswiadczyc boskosci i wyrazic ich wlasna boskosc. Tak bys zaznal blogosci, ktora plynie z kontaktu z boskoscia w tobie.”
– Sadhguru

“Istnieje tylko jeden biznes na swiecie i dotyczy on dobrostanu ludzi.”
 – Sadhguru

Sadhguru w 1992 roku zalozyl Isha, fundacje non-profit. Jest to organizacja mocno zaangazowana w niesienie pomocy ludziom w biednych obszarach wiejskich w Indiach. Fundacja udziela pomocy medycznej i spolecznej - leczac ludzi, angazujac ich w rozne aktywnosci (np. formy rękodziela) i budujac lub adoptujac istniejace juz szkoly dla dzieci. Isha jest takze zaangazowana w rozne inne dzialania, np. Projekt GreenHands (PGH). Jest to inicjatywa srodowiskowa Fundacji, ktorej celem jest zwiekszenie pokrywy zielonej w stanie Tamil Nadu do 33%, wymaganych dla przywrocenia rownowagi srodowiska. W tym celu zostanie posadzonych 114 milionow drzew. Pobito juz rekord Guinessa - 17 pazdziernika 2006 posadzono najwieksza ilosc sadzonek drzew w ciagu jednego dnia (852 587 sadzonek) :)

Sadghuru jest rowniez zaangazowany w kontakty z liderami ekonomicznymi, chcac poprzez nich zyskac wplyw na poprawe jakosci zycia wielu milionow ludzi, ktorych zycie w znacznej mierze jest zalezne od postawy tych liderow. Osobiscie bral udzial w wielu miedzynarodowych forach ekonomicznych, jak np. w Davos.


Powyzej mozecie obejrzec jedna z rozmow z ekonomicznymi liderami, tutaj z Vinita Bali, hinduska businesswoman, Dyrektor Zarzadzajaca i CEO Britannia Industries Limited.


Powyzej mozecie obejrzec rozmowe ze znana indyjska dziennikarka telewizyjna Barkha Dutt.

Stworzone przez Isha programy nauki jogi maja ogromna sile oddzialywania, powodujac glebokie wewnetrzne przemiany. Podobnie jak inspirujace projekty sluzace spolecznosciom i srodowisku sa one doceniane na calym swiecie, co znajduje odbicie w przydzielonym Isha statusie doradcy przy Radzie Gospodarczej i Spolecznej ONZ.

Fundacja potrzebuje prawdziwych pieniedzy, zeby udzielac takiej pomocy!
Duchowosc i siedzenie w jaskini nie wystarczaja same w sobie
do osiagniecia takich celow.

Sadhguru oferuje poprzez Fundacje Isha wiele programow jogi, wywodzacych sie z rdzenia wiedzy starozytnej jogi. Sa to szczegolowo dopracowane programy o bardzo duzej sile oddzialywania, glownie praktyki krija jogi, dzialajace bezposrednio na procesy energetyczne w organizmie i na fizjologię calego organizmu. Przy tym praktyki te sa tak skonstruowane, ze wymagaja wzglednie malo czasu oraz sa latwe do nauczenia. Poza praktykami krija jogi, Isha oferuje rowniez programy uczace kluczowych asan jogi (karma joga).

Jest to rdzen starozytnej jogi, w czystym przekazie Patanjali, a wiec.. pierwotna forma jogi, bardzo trudna do odnalezienie obecnie na swiecie. Programy te nie maja nalecialosci regionalnych i kulturowych gromadzących się przez tysiace lat, ktore zmienily oblicze i znaczenie jogi. Jest to sama esencja starozytnej wiedzy o budowie wszechswiata, o tym jak odkryc zrodlo stworzenia wewnatrz nas samych i osiągnąć stabilny dobrostan.
Czy wiesz, ze przekaz starozytnej jogi znajduje swoje potwierdzenie w koncepcjach i odkryciach wspolczesnej nauki?
Czy wiesz, ze w tradycji jogi Shiva nie oznacza hinduskiego boga? Shiva doslownie oznacza "to czego nie ma" i odnosi sie dokladnie to tego samego zjawiska, ktore wspolczesna fizyka nazywa ciemna materia i ciemna energia. Do zjawiska, ktore jest wieksza czescia wszechswiata i jest zrodlem tego istnienia, a ktore znamy z wlasnego doswiadczenia jako rzeczywistosc fizykalna. Do inteligencji, ktora wykracza daleko poza ludzki umysl, i ktora konstruuje caly wszechswiat.


•••••••••••••••••••••
•••  MOJA JOGA  •••
••••••••••••••••••••••

Zobacz w zakładce "updates" krótki opis historii wokół tego zdjęcia (update nr 3).

Jestem gleboko zaangazowany w praktyke jogi (prosze nie mylcie tego z wyginaniem ciala w roznych przedziwnych pozycjach), codziennie okolo 2 godziny przeznaczam na joge. Jednak musze przyznac, ze kiedy zaczynalem praktykowac, nie myslalem, jak wielu zmian doswiadcze zaledwie po 3 miesiacach najbardziej podstawowej praktyki krija jogi (Shambhavi Mahamudra, 21 minut na wykonanie). Bylo to dla mnie duzym zaskoczeniem.  Jednak to jest moje doswiadczenie i trudno mu zaprzeczac.  Sa dwa rodzaje bledu w poznawaniu swiata, a zadnego z nich nie chcialem popelnic: albo zbyt latwo cos uznajemy i budujemy fantazyjne przekonania, albo zbyt szybko odrzucamy to, co nie pasuje do naszego modelu swiata i nie mozemy poznac nic wiecej, niz pozwala nasz dotychczasowy system przekonan .

Zmiany których doswiadczylem:
1) przestalem sie przeziebiac (przedtem przeziebialem sie conajmniej raz w miesiacu, juz nawet zaczalem powaznie sie martwic, ze moj organizm najwyrazniej szwankuje)
2) najtrudniejsze dla mnie emocje staly sie duzo mniej intensywne i krotsze; zmiana nastapila w takim stopniu, ze nie moglem w to uwierzyc - zycie stalo sie o wiele latwiejsze :)
3) moj proces myslenia stal sie jeszcze jasniejszy (choc myslenie zawsze bylo moja mocna strona ;) )

Zapragnalem wiecej. Czy znasz... takie pragnienie, zeby poszerzac swoje mozliwosci? :) Obecnie robie wiele praktyk ze starozytnej jogi. Jestem gotow, by dotrzec do pelni. Chcialbym przekroczyc obecny zakres percepcji rzeczywistosci. Oczywiscie, to nie oznacza, ze chcialbym stracic rozum, czy "odleciec" :) Po prostu chcialbym sam doswiadczyc kontaktu ze zrodlem stworzenia. Ta wyprawa w Himalaje z Sadhguru jest milowym krokiem w tym kierunku. Jestem o tym gleboko przekonany. Kontakt z mistrzem jest czyms trudnym do przecenienia. To jak GPS w nieznanym terenie - cos co mogloby trwac dlugie lata mozesz zrobic w miesiace.

W calym systemie jogi wszystko jest oparte na namacalnym doswiadczeniu, a nie na poleganiu na czyichs przekonaniach. Dlatego jedynym sposobem poznania jest osobiste doswiadczenie, sprawdzenie na wlasnej skorze.


•••••••••••••••••••••
•••  SADHGURU  •••
•••••••••••••••••••••

Slowo ‘Isha’ oznacza pierwotne zrodlo stworzenia nieposiadajace formy . Kto za tym wszystkim stoi? Zobaczcie:

Oswiecenie Sadhguru.
Popoludniem 23 wrzesnia 1982 roku mlody biznesmen usiadl w swoim ulubionym miejscu na wzgorzu Chamundi. Kiedy siedzial tam z otwartymi oczami, nagle osunal sie w stan, w ktorym nie mogl rozroznic pomiedzy soba i swoim otoczeniem. To bylo jak zdumiewajaca eksplozja. "To co bylo "mna" bylo wszedzie." Po niemal 4 godzinach, ktore odczuwal jak kilka minut, powrocil do zwyklego poczucia siebie. Odkryl, ze jest we lzach, a jego umysl racjonalisty zmagal sie, zeby znalezc jakies wyjasnienie tego, co się z nim dzialo –
“Wewnatrz mnie cos dzialo sie. Nie wiedzialem co. Jedyne co wiedzialem, to ze trafilem na skarb i nie chce go utracic."


ZOBACZCIE jak opisuje SWOJE DOSWIADCZENIE tutaj w google na Konferencji INK w 2009.


Mozna powiedziec, ze Sadhguru nie ustepuje w swym doswiadczeniu i mozliwosciach Buddzie Gautama.

"Wszystko w istnieniu, kazda fizyczna forma, jest kwestia geometrii. To czy cos funkcjonuje z latwoscia czy nie, podstawowo zalezy od perfekcji geometrii. Caly system hata yogi polega na tym - popraw swoja geometrie w taki sposob, zeby to urzadzenie moglo funkcjonowac bez tarc wewnatrz siebie. Dopiero kiedy nie ma wewnetrznego tarcia przestajesz byc problemem. Jednak kiedy juz samo istnienie stanowi dla ciebie problem, gdzie jest miejsce na pytanie o zwiekszanie zakresu swiadomosci? W takiej sytuacji to nie moze sie ci przydarzyc. Dopiero kiedy wszystko funkcjonuje z latwoscia mozesz sie czegos podjac. Kiedy nie jestes juz problemem, mozesz zajac sie czymkolwiek zechcesz. Albo - mozesz zamknac oczy i siedziec - oba wybory sa dostepne."
- Sadhguru

DOLACZ DO TEGO PRZEDSIEWZIECIA!
Obiecuje, ze podziele sie z ludzmi wszystkim, czego uda mi sie doswiadczyc, tak szczerze jak tylko bede umial.

TO JEST NAPRAWDE PROJEKT TYPU WIN-WIN.
story_txt:
>>>  POLISH VERSION DOWN BELOW<<<>>> PONIZEJ JEST WERSJA W JEZYKU POLSKIM <<<

••••••••••••••••••••••  THE IDEA  ••••••••••••••••••••••
This project is to bring help for children in Tamil Nadu, India and to help me fulfill my great dream. You can call it "2 in 1 deep from the heart".Once a year, Isha Foundation (est. 1992) organises the unique Himalaya trek for 35 participants, which is only on invitation basis. Each one has to make... 25 000$ donation, 85% of these funds then go to schools adopted by Isha. This trek is the fundraising created by Isha. And I have received the invitation in the end of April... but the donation is completely out of my range and the registration for this year's trek closes on 31 May 2015.This is the unique ONCE-IN-A-LIFETIME Himalaya spiritual journey, which is - at the same time - the social NON-PROFIT communities intense development program (adoption of public schools in India and revamping the education model, to make it child-friendly, growth-supporting and break the poverty cycle this way).Please read and see, if you want to be part of this (please, feel free to ask questions if anything requires additional information).
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••• THE DEADLINE ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Actually, there are two deadlines :)In variant "energy" - until 31st May 2015In variant "patience" - until end of April 2016 (postponed a year)So, this or that way, but we can be successful :)In both scenarios the money will go directly to the Foundation. You can see more details in the following chapter "Budget: where is the money going?".Now, please aim at "energy". I will let you know in updates when the plan B is on."Patience" is more difficult as it involves waiting... :) but big goals need time to realise!UPDATE:Time to shift to plan B! It looks like there is too little time to gather necessary donation for this year. And Isha confirmed that my invitation will be still valid for 2016!!!So, I will continue my crowd-funding endeavour until the next year's trek. The CAMPAIGN WILL BE CONTINUED until April 2016!
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••  BUDGET: WHERE IS THE MONEY GOING?  •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Isha Foundation creates a long term projects on the large scale, which are then carrefully taken care of. They know that big results require wisdom and persistence. More descriptions of Isha projects you can see down below in the "Isha Foundation" section.This Isha foundrising bundle consists of two parts:••• PART 1 of this project (85% of funds or more):So, this HIMALAYAN TREK IS planned as a FUNDRAISING PROGRAM and 85% of the proceeds will go to the rural outreach projects of Isha Foundation
 (changing the education model in India to make it more child-friendly, 
and growth-supporting by adoption and revamping of public schools). The smaller part is for organizing the trek itself - that's how they deciced. Because of this… the required donation is set very high, far beyond my financial range.There are 100s of rural schools adopted by Isha in India to revamp the whole education system which is being a major role player for the upliftment of rural India.Isha changes the education system in India by three different initiatives:1) Isha has its own Isha Home School (a completely astonishing place, believe me I have seen many fantastic schools in my life, but this one is just amazing).2) Isha Vidhya (9 Rural Schools in Tamil Nadu & Andhra Pradesh, built by Isha with 5820 children, 58% of them on full scholarship and the rest on subsidised fees).3) Adoption of public schools in Tamil Nadu, Indie (aims to enhance the quality of education in Govt. schools and result in several thousands of children benefiting from a meaningful education).The Adoption of Public Schools program aims to deeply restructure the adopted schools, to make it child-friendly and growth-supporting.
Inducting teachers to teach remedial classes to mainstream the slow learners
Improving English language capabilities of children through other methodologies.
Infusing hitherto neglected aspects like Sports, Yoga, Arts & Crafts, Health, Hygiene & Environmental awareness, to bring all round development and sustain children’s interest in coming to school.   
Adding some badly needed infrastructure like toilets, computers, library books, etc.
Training Govt. school teachers to access and use classroom educational aids and digital content.
The necessary donation (per each participant) for this non-profit Isha Foundation project is  25 000 USD . So we need to gather minimum 27 500 $ (including indiegogo fees and transaction bank fees).BUT REMEMBER...••• EACH 5$ IS VERY IMPORTANT !!! •••AS DROPS MAKE THE OCEANOF COURSE,IF WE COLLECT MORE - THE DONATION WILL BE BIGGER :) (The additional costs of necessary preparations for the trek I will pay myself.)IF THE GOAL IS ONLY PARTLY REALISED - THE BLACK SCENARIO:
all gathered money go to children :)))
I do not go to Himalaya with Sadhguru neither this nor next year :(
BUT IT IS STILL GOOD !!!!! :)

VERY IMPORTANT: After the campaign is closed everyone will receive the scan of confirmation of donation
 for Isha Foundation by email or I will upload it to the updates 
section, with a registered number, which you can check at Isha directly.
••••• PART 2 of this project (15% of funds or less):I just have been offered a very unique opportunity to participate in the Himalayan 
trek with one of the greatest living Masters of ancient yoga, Sadhguru.This will be an intimate small group of people with a once-in-a-life 
time opportunity to travel for 21 days to the sacred spaces of Kailash 
and Manasarovar with each step guided by Sadhguru himself. This is a chance for me to 
experience different states of awareness and to get in touch with the core of life process. This program is offered not as a tour, but as a possibility for deep spiritual transformation. This is something amazing for me, a chance for a great dream becoming reality. I have invested so much in self development during my whole life - this would be time for harvest. The contact with spiritual Master is like using GPS in unknown terrain - something which could take long years to achieve you may reach in a matter of months. Sadhguru says it this way: "GPS stands for Guru Positioning System" :) “Manasarovar is a phenomena that defies human logic. There are not 
many things I can say about it. I think every human being who is 
interested in the nature of life; in the nature of life beyond us; in 
the nature of intelligence beyond us - must make a visit to this place 
because here is… it clearly defies our logic and intelligence."– SadhguruAnd I am a seeker all my life asking questions about the nature of the existence. But also a sceptic and realist, who decided to gradually open toward spirituality. Not as some new age excitement but spirituality seen as an old science deeply rooted in the very core of construction of the universe. I was always extremely interested in the life itself but at the same time very cautious as a realist not to go some dead-end street. "When you believe something does't mean you know it" - like Sadhguru says. It's difficult not to agree with it, when you are aware that your mind is limited and likes the ruts of beaten track."As we have physical science to create external well-being there is a whole inner dimension of science to create inner well being. I call it Inner Engineering."- Sadhguru

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••  THE ISHA FOUNDATION  •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
You may still wonder if money and enlightened spirituality go well together. Sadhguru is a very rare type of realized yogi and mistic. He is both the enlightened being and a man of the world. He is not sitting in some cave, though he’s one of the biggest yogis on the planet.So, sometimes you can see him riding his bike :)As he says it himself "...being spiritual does not necessary mean being impractical..."But...This life for me is an endeavor to help people experience and express their divinity. May you know the bliss of the Divine.” – Sadhguru“There is only one business in the world and that is of human wellbeing.” – SadhguruHe has founded in 1992 Isha as a non-profit foundation which is strongly engaged in helping people in poor rural areas in India. Isha conducts their projects, with both medical and social help, curing people, engaging them in different activities or building schools for children. Isha is running also other initiatives, like The Project GreenHands (PGH). This environmental project aims to increase the green cover of the state of Tamil Nadu to the required 33%, by planting 114 million trees. PGH set a Guinness World Record on 17th October, 2006 for planting maximum number of saplings in a single day ( 852 587 saplings).Sadghuru is also engaged in contact with economic leaders to rich through them a significant influence on people's life who are dependent on these leaders. He is a participant of many important economic international forums, like Davos.Above you can watch the talk with Vinita Bali, an Indian businesswoman who is the Managing Director and CEO of Britannia Industries Limited.Above you can watch the talk with a well known Indian television journalist Barkha Dutt.Isha’s powerful yoga programs for inner transformation and inspiring projects for society and environment are appreciated worldwide, reflecting in Isha's consultative status with the United Nations Economic and Social Council.
They need real money to do this! Spirituality and sitting in cave is not enough to achieve such goals.
Drawn from the essence of the ancient yogic sciences, Sadhguru offers  many Yogic Programs through Isha Foundation. These are fine distilled and very powerful programs, mostly kriya practices influencing directly ones energies. At the same time they are relatively little time consuming and easy to learn. In spite of kriyas, Isha is also offering yogaasanas programs.This is the core of ancient yoga, in pure Patanjali way of teaching which is an extremely rare thing to find in the world now. This means yoga, without geographical and cultural transformations gathered over thousands of years, gradually changing the face and the meaning of yoga. Isha is teaching us just the essence of ancient yoga knowledge about construction of the universe, discovering the source of creation inside us and above all how to experience blissfulness.Did you know, that this ancient yogic knowledge is confirmed by concepts and discoveries of modern sciences?Did you know that in yogic lore Shiva does not mean a hindu god? It literaly means "that which is not" and this refers exactly to what modern phisics calls dark matter and dark energy. The vast part of existence which is not in our perception right now, but is the basis of the physical existence as we know it. The intelligence which is far beyond human one and which constructs the whole universe.
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••  MY YOGA PRACTICE  ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
See updates tab for a short story behind this picture (update #3).I am deeply engaged in yoga practice now (do not mistake this for twisting the body in strange postures) - 2 hours daily. But when I started I could not believe the range of changes I have experienced just after 3 months of a most basic kriya practice (Shambhavi Mahamudra, 21 minutes to complete). It was completely surprising to me. But it was my experience and it was hard to deny.  There are two types of the mistake on the way to know better the world and I wanted to avoid both of them. One - when you accept many things easily, without hesitation, and thus you are drawn into you own imagination. The other one, when you reject everything which does not fit your current model of assumptions and thus you cannot go beyond your current beliefs.The changes I've experienced at the beginning:1) I stopped getting colds (I was getting cold once a month and worried there is something very wrong with my health)2) The most difficult emotions are smoothed to the degree I couldn't believe - the life become so much easier :)3) My thought process become even brighter (though thinking was always a strong side of me)So I wanted more. You always want to expand. :) So, I do many more ancient yoga practices right now. And I want it all. I want to go beyond our common level of perceiving reality. Of course, this doesn't mean I want loose my mind :) I simply want to experience the core of creation and blissfulness. This Himalayan trek with Sadhguru is a milestone step in this direction. I know it so intensely. The contact with the master is something difficult to overestimate. This is like using GPS in unknown terrain - something which could take long years to achieve you may reach in a matter of months.In the whole yoga system everything is a matter of experience, not a matter of a somebody's else belief. Thus the only way is to try it yourself.
•••••••••••••••••••••••••  SADHGURU  •••••••••••••••••••••••••
The word ‘Isha’ means the formless primordial source of creation. Who stands behind it? See below:
Sadhguru’s Enlightenment.
On the afternoon of September 23, 1982, a young businessman sat down at his favorite spot on Chamundi Hill. As he sat with his eyes open, suddenly he slipped into a state where he could not differentiate between himself and his surroundings. It was a staggering explosion. “What was ‘me’ was everywhere.” After nearly four hours, which felt like only a few minutes, he came back to his usual self. He found himself drenched in tears, while his mind grappled to find an explanation – “Something was happening within me. I did not know what it was. All I knew was – I’ve hit a goldmine and I didn’t want to lose it.”WATCH how he describes HIS EXPERIENCE here at google INK Conference at 2009.Well, one may say Sadhguru’s capabilities are in the scope of Gautama the Buddha."Everything in the existence, every physical form, is a question of geometry. Whether something functions smoothly or not essentially depends upon the perfection of geometry. The whole system of hatha yoga is just this – to fix your geometry in such a way that this machine will function without any friction within itself. Only when there is no inner friction you are no longer an issue. But if just existing here is an issue, where is the question of scaling the peaks of consciousness? Such a thing will not occur to you. Only when everything is at ease can you take something on. When you are not an issue, you can attend to anything you want. Or, you can close your eyes and sit – both the choices are here."- Sadhguru

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••  JAKI TO PROJEKT?  •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Ten projekt niesie duza pomoc dla dzieci w Tamil Nadu, Indie oraz pomoc dla mnie w spelnieniu mojego wielkiego marzenia. W sumie jest to takie "2 w 1 gleboko od serca".Fundacja Isha (rok zal. 1992) organizuje raz w roku niezwykla wyprawe w Himalaje dla 35 uczestnikow, w ktorej mozna wziac udzial po otrzymaniu zaproszenia. Kazdy uczestnik musi zrobic donacje w wysokosci... 25 000$, a 85% tej kwoty zostaje przeznaczona na pomoc szkolom zaadoptowanym prze Isha. Ta wyprawa jest sposobem w jaki Isha zbiera pieniadze na cele swojej fundacji. Pod koniec kwietnia otrzymalem zaproszenie od Isha... ale donacja jest calkowicie poza moim zasiegiem, a rejestracja na wyprawe konczy sie 31 maja 2015.Mam szanse na doświadczenie, które zdarza sie RAZ W ZYCIU - duchowa wyprawa w Himalaje. Jednoczesnie, ta wyprawa jest zbiorka pieniedzy na program fundacji NON-PROFIT,  wspierajacy rozwoj dzieci w ubogich spolecznosciach (poprzez adopcje szkol publicznych, aby zmienic model edukacji na przyjazny dzieciom i wspierajacy ich rozwoj - zeby przerwac cykl ubostwa w tych regionach).Przeczytajcie i zobaczcie czy chcielibyście pomóc mi w tym (i prosze pytajcie mnie o wszystko, cokolwiek wydaloby sie nie dosc jasne).
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• DO KIEDY TRWA ZBIORKA? •••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
W zasadzie, to są dwa terminy zakonczenia zbiorki :)W wariancie "energia" - do 31 Maja 2015W wariancie "cierpliwosc" - do konca kwietnia 2016 (pozniej o rok)W ten sposob, tak czy siak moze sie udac :)W obu scenariuszach pieniadze trafia bezposrednio do fundacji Isha. Wiecej informacji znajdziesz w nastepnym rozdziale "Budzet: na co ida te pieniadze?"Na razie, prosze nastawiaj sie na wariant "energia". Dam znac w 'updates' jesli przejdziemy do planu B."Cierpliwosc" jest trudniejsza wersja, bo wymaga czekania... :) ale duze cele wymagaja czasu na realizacje!UPDATE:Czas przejsc do planu B! Widac, ze zostalo za malo czasu, zeby uzbierac potrzebna kwote na ten rok. Mam potwierdzenie od Isha, ze moje zaproszenie zachowuje waznosc na rok 2016! :)Bede wiec kontynuowal ten projekt crowd-fundingowy do przyszlego roku. Czyli kampania będzie prowadzona do kwietnia 2016! :)
••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••  BUDZET: NA CO IDĄ TE PIENIĄDZE?  ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Fundacja Isha tworzy dlugoterminowe programy pomocy, na duza skale, ktore sa pozniej realizowane z duzo starannoscia. Doskonale wiedza, ze do osiagniecia duzych celow potrzeba madrosci i wytrwalosci. Wiecej opisow innych projektow fundacji mozna znalezc w podrozdziale "Fundacja Isha" w tekscie ponizej.Ten projekt zbiorki pieniedzy przez Isha jest zestawem zlozonych z dwoch czesci: ••• CZESC 1 tego projektu (85% funduszy lub wiecej):Ta jedyna w swoim rodzaju WYPRAWA W HIMALAJE JEST POMYSLANA PRZEZ ISHA JAKO ZBIORKA FUNDUSZY, a 85% zebranych środkow zostanie przeznaczone na  wiejskie programy pomocowe prowadzone przez Fundacje Isha
 (zmiana modelu edukacji w Indiach na przyjazny dzieciom, wspierajacy 
ich rozwoj, poprzez adopcje szkol publicznych i objecie ich opieka 
Isha). Mniejsza czesc kwoty idzie na organizowanie samej wyprawy. Dlatego... wymagana donacja od kazdego uczestnika jest ustalona bardzo wysoko. Niestety, zupelnie poza zasiegiem moich mozliwosci.Fundacja Isha zaadoptowala 100-ki wiejskich szkol
 w Indiach, zeby przebudowac caly system edukacji, ktory ma ogromy wplyw na poprawianie warunkow zycia ludzi z wiejsckich obszarow Indii. Kiedy edukacja sprzyja dzieciom, pozwala na wyrwanie ludzi z zakletego kregu ubostwa. Taka zbiorka Isha organizuje co roku.Isha zmienia system edukacji w Indiach prowadzac trzy rozne inicjatywy:1) storzyli swoja wlasna Isha Home School (zupelnie niezwykle miejsce, wierzcie, ze widzialem juz kilka wspanialych szkol w swoim zyciu, ale ta na prawde oczarowujaca)2) Isha Vidhya (9 wiejskich szkol w Tamilnadu i Andhra Pradesh, zbudowanych przez Isha. Chodzi do nich 5820 dzieci, 58% z nich ma pelne stupendium a reszta jest na czesciowym wsparciu)3) Adopcja szkol publicznych w Tamilnadu, Indie (w celu poprawy sposobu nauczania w tych szkolach, tak zeby dziesiatki tysiecy dzieci w tych szkolach mogly otrzymac dobra, wspierajaca edukacje)Celem programu Adopcji Szkol Publicznych jest gleboka przebudowa sposobu nauczania w tych szkolach, zeby staly sie przyjazne dzieciom i wspierajace ich rozwoj.
poprawa w poslugiwaniu sie przez dzieci jezykiem angielskim, poprzez wlaczenie innych metod nauczania,
wprowadzanie dotad pomijanych aspektow jak sport, joga, sztuka i rekodzielo, zdrowie, higiena, swiadomosc dot. srodowiska - zeby zadbac o wszechstronny rozwoj i zachecic dzieci do przychodzenia do szkoly,
uzupelnianie niezbednej infrastruktury, jak toalety, komputery, ksiazki do bibliotek szkolnych, itp.
szkolenia zawodowe dla nauczycieli z tych szkol publicznych, zeby w bogatszy i ciekawy sposob prowadzili lekcje, stosujac urozmaicone pomoce, w tym komputery.
Potrzebna donacja dla Fundacji Isha (non-profit) wynosi w tym projekcie 25 000 USD (na kazdego uczestnika wyprawy). Zalezy mi dlatego, zeby zebrac 27 500 $ (uwzgledniajac oplaty platformy indiegogo oraz oplaty bankowe).

••••• CZESC 2 tego projektu (15% funduszy lub mniej):To mozliwosc udzialu w wyprawie w Himalaje z jednym z wielkich obecnie zyjacych mistrzow starozytnej jogi, Sadhguru.Niewielka grupa uczestnikow bedzie miala niepowtarzalna w zyciu szanse podrozowac przez 21 dni do Kailash i Manasarowar, pod przewodnictwem Sadhguru. Sa to miejsca o szczególnym znaczeniu duchowym, z niezwyklymi wlasciwosciami energetycznymi. Dla mnie jest to szansa na doswiadczenie stanow poszerzonej swiadomosci i dotknięcie rdzenia procesu zycia. Ta wyprawa jest pomyslana nie jako turystyka, tylko jako okazja na gleboka duchowa przemiane. Jest to coś absolutnie niezwyklego dla mnie, szansa, zeby spelnilo sie wielkie marzenie. Przez cale zycie zainwestowalem ogromna ilosc energii w rozwoj, prace nad soba - to jest szansa na zbieranie owocow. Mistrz duchowy jest jak GPS w nieznanym terenie - cos co mogloby trwac dlugie lata mozesz zrobic w miesiace. Jak mowi Sadhguru, GPS oznacza Guru Positioning System. :) “Manasarovar jest zjawiskiem, ktore stawia wyzwanie logice ludzkiego umyslu. Niewiele rzeczy moge teraz o nim powiedziec. Uwazam, ze kazdy czlowiek, ktorego ciekawi czym jest natura procesu zycia; natura procesu zycia poza zyciem jakie sami znamy; natura inteligencji wykraczajaca poza ta jaka znamy sami - powinien odwiedzic to miejsce, poniewaz... w bardzo przejrzysty sposob stawia ono wyzwanie naszej ludzkiej logice i inteligencji."– SadhguruPrzez cale zycie zadawalem pytania o zycie, istnienie i szukalem odpowiedzi. Jestem tez sceptykiem i realista, ktory zdecydowal sie stopniowo otworzyc na duchowosc. Nie chodzi mi o rodzaj podekscytowania w stylu new age, ale o stabilny rozwoj duchowosci, osadzonej w starozytnej wiedzy jogicznej, w zasadach konstruujacych wszechswiat.Od zawsze bylem niezwykle zaciekawiony zyciem jako takim, a rownoczesnie bylem ostroznym realista. Zalezalo mi, zeby nie utknac w jakims slepym zaulku posiadanych przekonan. "To, ze jestes o czyms przekonany nie znaczy, ze to wiesz" - jak mowi Sadhguru. Trudno sie z tym nie zgodzic, jesli wiemy, ze nasz umysl ma ograniczenia i lubi koleiny utartych sciezek."Podobnie jak mamy nauki fizyczne, zeby tworzyc zewnetrzny dobrostan , istnieje caly wewnetrzny wymiar nauki sluzacy temu, by tworzyc wewnetrzny dobrostan. Nazywam go  Wewnetrzna Inzynieria."- Sadhguru
